name: RG

services.title: API Development
services.description: Specialize in building robust and scalable APIs, ensuring seamless integration between the front-end and back-end of your application.

services.title: Database Management
services.description: Design and manage efficient databases, ensuring data security, integrity, and optimization to keep your application running smoothly.

services.title: Server-Side Development
services.description: Handle all aspects of server-side programming, ensuring your applications perform at their best, with a focus on speed, reliability, and scalability.

aboutpara:
As a passionate and driven software developer, I bring a versatile skill set across both front-end and back-end web development. With a strong foundation in building efficient and scalable applications, I continuously seek opportunities to enhance my expertise and stay ahead in the ever-changing tech landscape.

Eager to tackle new challenges, I am committed to crafting innovative solutions that improve user experiences and contribute to impactful projects. Let's collaborate to create something extraordinary in this dynamic world of technology!

resume.description:
As a motivated software developer, I bring a versatile skill set that spans both front-
end and back-end web development. Well-versed with NodeJS,PHP, MongoDB, Firebase, MySQL, Javascript, ReactJS.

experiences.position: Back End Developer at Biltek Design and Software Inc.
experiences.bullets: I worked as a Back-end Developer on numerous corporate promotional and e-commerce website projects, Primarily using PHP | AJAX | MySQL | JavaScript.

experiences.position: Game Developer at MAG Game Studio
experiences.bullets: Developed hyper-casual hybrid-casual and puzzle games, Primarily using Unity | C# | OOP
Developed user interfaces and established a connection between database., Primarily using ReactJS | NodeJS | MongoDB
